summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Submissions Management feature. All 17 backend tests passed. All frontend UI components working correctly. Fixed a duplicate route definition bug in server.py that was causing 520 errors on DELETE endpoint.
passed_tests: Submissions button appears at top of admin dashboard with red notification badge
Clicking Submissions button navigates to /admin/submissions page
Submissions page shows status filters (ALL, PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED)
ALL filter shows 43 submissions
PENDING filter shows 22 submissions (after test actions)
APPROVED filter shows 12 submissions
REJECTED filter shows 8 submissions
Individual submission selection with checkboxes works
Select All checkbox selects all 25 submissions
Bulk APPROVE button appears and shows count (25) when all items selected
Bulk DELETE button appears and shows count (25) when all items selected
Individual approve button works - submission moves to approved
Individual reject button works - submission moves to rejected
Individual delete button works - submission is removed
Back button returns to admin dashboard
Red notification badge shows when there are pending submissions
GET /api/admin/submissions with status=pending returns pending submissions
GET /api/admin/submissions with status=approved returns approved submissions
GET /api/admin/submissions with status=rejected returns rejected submissions
GET /api/admin/submissions/unseen-count returns pending count for badge
POST /api/admin/submissions/{id}/approve approves submission
POST /api/admin/submissions/{id}/reject rejects submission
DELETE /api/admin/submissions/{id} deletes submission
Admin login with correct password succeeds
Admin login with wrong password fails with 401
Pagination works correctly (page 1, page 2)

bug_fixed.description: Fixed duplicate route definition for DELETE /admin/submissions/{submission_id} endpoint
bug_fixed.issue: There was an empty @api_router.delete decorator at line 1468 without a function body, followed by another complete definition at line 1490. This caused a 520 error when calling the delete endpoint.
bug_fixed.fix: Removed the empty decorator at line 1467-1469

seed_data_creation: Used existing test data - 22 pending, 12 approved, 8 rejected submissions after test actions
context_for_next_testing_agent: Submissions Management feature fully tested: 1) Admin dashboard has SUBMISSIONS button at top with red notification badge showing pending count. 2) /admin/submissions page has status filters (ALL, PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED), Select All checkbox, individual checkboxes, bulk APPROVE/DELETE buttons with count, and individual approve/reject/delete buttons. 3) All APIs working: GET /api/admin/submissions (with status filter), GET /api/admin/submissions/unseen-count, POST /api/admin/submissions/{id}/approve, POST /api/admin/submissions/{id}/reject, DELETE /api/admin/submissions/{id}. Fixed duplicate route definition bug in server.py.
